CSS3 SELECTORS DEMO：E:nth-of-type(n)

  • 一覧に戻る

E:nth-of-type(n)

HTML

CSS

.demo h4:nth-of-type(odd){
    color:#ffffff;
    background-color:#ff0000;
}
.demo h4:nth-of-type(even){
    color:#ffffff;
    background-color:#0000ff;
}
